## Restock Recommendation

| Parameter                         | Value                                     |
|-----------------------------------|-------------------------------------------|
| Recommended Order Size            | 20,000 units                             |
| Rationale                         | Current stock is sufficient to cover demand for the next day. Ordering 20,000 units ensures enough inventory for the next 5 days, factoring in lead time and a buffer for potential demand fluctuations.  |
| Comparison with Player's Plan     | Player planned to buy 0 units. Ordering 20,000 units ensures ample stock to meet forecasted demand and prevent potential stockouts. |
| Estimated Stock Turnover Days     | ~4.4 days                                 |
| Forecasted Demand Coverage Days   | ~5 days                                   |
| Comments                          | Ordering 20,000 units provides the best balance between meeting forecasted demand and optimizing inventory levels. The order size also falls within the available vendor order quantities and avoids exceeding the minimum purchase quantity for potential discount benefits. |
